statements: UPDATE player_behavior SET interaction_type = 'view' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_behavior SET player_name = 'John Doe', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_behavior SET interaction_type = 'comment', interaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_behavior SET player_name = 'Alice', interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 2
UPDATE Players SET level = 5 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_type = 'login', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE player_id = '456e7890-12d3-45a6-bcde-789012345678'
UPDATE Players SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_type = 'Battle', interaction_timestamp = '2021-10-15 14:30:00' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = '9d4c8b19-77fd-4c3e-8c57-f6c6bc94e51c';
UPDATE PlayerProgress SET progress_percentage = 75.5, level_completed = 5 WHERE player_id = 'e4a6366b-43ee-44fa-854b-0cf21153374c';
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 'c33f732a-71ee-4db8-a31a-866add96f3a0';
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great game!' WHERE player_id = '3dbb1e98-fb82-4a5c-a8cf-1729da391385';
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_sessions SET end_time = '2023-06-30 15:00:00' WHERE session_id = 101;
UPDATE players SET experience = 500, level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_rewards SET reward_amount = 1000 WHERE player_id = 2 AND reward_type = 'Coins';
UPDATE players SET total_points = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_progress SET current_level = 5, progress_percent = 85.50 WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET total_points = total_points + 100, level = level + 1 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', interaction_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE interaction_id = 201;
